title: Bookmarks lost from Firefox and cannot restore
content: My bookmarks disappeared from Firefox yesterday and I cannot restore them. In addition Firefox will not make any new bookmarks at all!? I have tried all the restore options advised: - Turning Firefox off and on. No good - Turning laptop off and on. No good - Windows security is up to date. Still no good - Going to Manage Bookmarks to Restore. None there to restore (possibly because of a CC Cleaner clean?). No good - I was able to find my profile and bookmarks back up. That would not open or load. I was able to find the Jefferson Scher software and use it to process a JSONLZ4 bookmarks file and export/download a HTML version. If I open the downloaded file I can click on that list of bookmarks to link to them (yay). But I cannot copy this list to the Book marks bar!? - I have tried to add some of these links as bookmarks again in Firefox, but no bookmarks appear in the bookmarks toolbar. So I am not sure what is wrong. Please help. Grateful any advice
creator: theenergygovernator

title: Slow to load website to the point of being timed ello,

I am running Windows 10, and the latest version of Firefox I have run a clean reinstall and still no dice.

title: Facebook Container
content:
Hello, I have Facebook Container installed (Windows 11) on my desktop. However, if I click a link to a FB page, say in an email or on a webpage, Facebook opens onto the current tab and makes it a container tab. Since I can not go back once FB is opened in the container tab, I have to open a new tab and go back to the original (pre FB) webpage. This is the only time this happens.

What settings can I change so that the Facebook Container opens Facebook into a new tab, not on top of an existing open tab?

Many thanks for the millions of us that are computer challenged.
creator: JN74105
